resources:
ZikoBot
Loading..
Start <--> With me, your alarm clock is more friendly, I program my favorite music! I need that you connect to your Spotify® or Deezer® account (requires a premium account) With your permission, I can also access my music stored locally on your phone.
Nice to meet you, I Zikobot, your musical assistant! Combines your musical accounts No account? No problem for me! Done Skip
Click here to add your first alarm Supports here to add my favorite songs
Menu <--> About Make an alarm Add to current playlist delete See guitar tab
Add all
Titles <--> My personal music Spotify Deezer My accounts
ActivityAlarm <--> Create an alarm Select the hour
Alarm title Name error Select your track Music choice
MON TUE WED THU FRI SAT SUN Repeat
Activity Wake Up <--> Stop
Connect to spotify Connection

Alarm management Validate %d tracks track(s)
Coming soon... Play alarm
Sorry I did not find any music on your phone I need you to add songs to start the alarm I need your permission to access your music :) album(s) Random mode Volume
SoundCloud Connect to SoundCloud Spotify Soundcloud Account Type : Spotify
Music Alarm Select your alarm Sorry, you have no Premium account ... I can not use Spotify without it :( Oops Sorry I do not handle that format yet :(
Next alarm : No alarm Click here to add No active alarms Click here to prepare Zikentifier
true true Zikobot, Android musical assistant settings
